solution_line_template: Barbara will be able to sell all her stuffed animals for {barbara_num_animals} x ${barbara_price_per_animal} = $<<{barbara_num_animals}*{barbara_price_per_animal}={barbara_total_money}>>{barbara_total_money}.
Trish will be able to sell all her stuffed animals for {trish_num_animals} x ${trish_price_per_animal} = $<<{trish_num_animals}*{trish_price_per_animal}={trish_total_money}>>{trish_total_money}.
Therefore, they will donate a total of ${barbara_total_money} + ${trish_total_money} = $<<{barbara_total_money}+{trish_total_money}={total_donation}>>{total_donation} to their class funds.
